definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: In addition, the number of the zenith delay parameters has effect on the tropospheric refraction.
sentences.chinese: 天顶延迟参数个数的选择对对流层折射有较大影响。

sentences.english: The numerical method for the inverse problem of second-dimensional advection-dispersion-reaction equations is discussed in the article.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了一类二维对流反应扩散方程反问题的数值解法。

sentences.english: Double diffusive convection during static crystallization was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了静态定向结晶过程中的双扩散对流现象。

sentences.english: Results show that it is in the Wutai mountain area that convective storms happened frequently.
sentences.chinese: 指出五台山是强对流天气的多发区。

sentences.english: Energy can be released and intense convective activity and maybe thunder storms are likely to develop.
sentences.chinese: 能量能够释放，强对流活动和雷暴就可能发展。

sentences.english: The tropospheric atmosphere refractivity of different laser wave length is expatiated.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了对流层不同波长激光的大气折射率。

sentences.english: It does not require an impediment to the flow .
sentences.chinese: 它不会造成对流力的干扰。

sentences.english: Areas ( shaded ) illustrate the regions where convective cloud frequency exceeds 30 %.
sentences.chinese: 阴影区表示该区域对流云出现频数超过30%。

sentences.english: The immune effect was detected by counter immunoelectrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 用对流免疫电泳试验检测免疫效果。

sentences.english: The process of frost formation on horizontal aluminum surface in natural convection was experimentally studied.
sentences.chinese: 实验研究了自然对流时水平铝表面上的结霜现象。

sentences.english: As soon as the tropopause is reached, temperature stops decreasing with height.
sentences.chinese: 一达到对流层，温度就停止随高度上升。

sentences.english: Coupling between Tropospheric and Stratospheric Leading Modes.
sentences.chinese: 对流层和平流层主要模态之间的耦合。

sentences.english: Lightning hazards usually happen in summer, they are one kind of meteorological hazards caused by stong convection.
sentences.chinese: 雷电灾害多发于夏季，是强对流天气灾害的一种。

sentences.english: The particle transport consists of outward diffusion and inward convection.
sentences.chinese: 粒子输运由向外扩散和向内对流构成。

sentences.english: High-power laser beam will have thermal booming effect when it pass through gas flow field.
sentences.chinese: 当强激光通过流场时，会对流场产生辐射加热作用。

sentences.english: Deep convective clouds play a role in regulating the Earth's temperature.
sentences.chinese: 深对流云系在调节地球温度中发挥着重要作用。
